nodes.text: Wioslea was a female Vuvrian who was a terrestrial vehicle sales merchant. Like others of her species, she had a large head with dual tentacles and eyes in multiple shapes and colors. In 0 BBY, she bought Luke Skywalker's X-34 landspeeder in Mos Eisley, Tatooine. The Vuvrian stood around the same height as Skywalker and his Jedi Master, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and had two arms that were each attached with a flat, green appendage that articulated to form a cupped hand.
Wioslea first appeared in the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The character was designed by Star Wars creator George Lucas himself. She was portrayed by the actor David Stone.
